title: Industrial provinces of Canada
brief_description: Ontario and Quebec, as the main industrial provinces of Canada, link Canada with the United States of America, and with the rest of the world, through the products of their industries. Mining, manufacturing, and agriculture in these two provinces make them vitally important to the well-being of the other Canadian provinces.
